ing: 1 pinch salt and cracked black pepper to taste
des: "A traditional Brazilian dish with a twist."
ins: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion; cook and stir until pale golden, about 5 minutes. Add carrot; cook for 1 minute. Stir in olives and parsley. Add manioc flour; cook and stir until lightly toasted, 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
